name: No Rest for Space Hombres
description:
Destroy asteroids as many asteroids as possible but watch out: they slowly get faster with each one destroyed.  Reflectors can't be destroyed and will deflect your shots, so avoid them. 

Collect power-ups to change your weapon type.   Getting several of the same type in a row increases your power.

Compatible with both keyboard and Xbox 360 controller.

Keyboard controls:

LEFT / RIGHT arrows - Move

UP arrow - Shoot / Navigate menu

DOWN arrow - Navigate menu

ENTER - Make selection

SPACE - Pause / Unpause

Controller controls:

Left Stick - Move / Navigate Menu

A - Shoot / Make selection

START - Pause / Unpause
